title: Kaempferia galanga L. alleviates the expression of COX-2 and NF-kappaB-p65 in the oral mucosa ulcer of Wistar rats and exhibits no irritation toward the vascular membrane of chicken eggs and the skin of albino rabbits
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Indah Suasani Wahyuni, Tresnafuty Rasyiida Diina, Annisa Siti Salsabila, Miski Aghnia Khairinisa, Irna Sufiawati, Jutti Levita, Aziiz Mardanarian Rosdianto, Wipawee Nittayananta
